alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 2:59AM EST until November 22 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations are expected to be elevation-dependent, ranging between 1 inch in valleys and lower areas and 6 inches across the higher elevations for a storm total of 2 to 8 inches. Sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch, and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and western Maine and central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
